NeatUtils
public static
NeatUtils

Utility methods for creating and correctly 'wiring up' instances of NeatEvolutionAlgorithm.

Functions
CreateNeatEvolutionAlgorithm
public static NeatEvolutionAlgorithm<double> CreateNeatEvolutionAlgorithm(
INeatExperiment<double> neatExperiment,
NeatPopulation<double> neatPop
)

Create a new instance of NeatEvolutionAlgorithm{T} for the given neat experiment, and neat population.

Parameters
neatExperiment
INeatExperiment<double>

A neat experiment instance; this conveys everything required to create a new evolution algorithm instance that is ready to be run.

neatPop
NeatPopulation<double>

A pre constructed/loaded neat population; this must be compatible with the provided neat experiment, otherwise an exception will be thrown.

Returns

A new instance of NeatEvolutionAlgorithm{T}.

CreateNeatEvolutionAlgorithm

)

Parameter

A neat experiment instance; this conveys everything required to create a new evolution algorithm instance that is ready to be run.
